parameters.name: X
parameters.description: X position of hole callout in meters

parameters.name: Y
parameters.description: Y position of hole callout in meters

parameters.name: Z
parameters.description: Z position of hole callout in meters

title: IDrawingDoc.IAddHoleCallout2
description: Adds a hole callout at the specified position to the hole whose edge is selected.
signature:
DisplayDimension IAddHoleCallout2( 
   System.Double
X
,
   System.Double
Y
,
   System.Double
Z
)

parameters.name: X
parameters.description: X position of hole callout in meters

parameters.name: Y
parameters.description: Y position of hole callout in meters

parameters.name: Z
parameters.description: Z position of hole callout in meters

returns: Pointer to DisplayDimension object representing the hole callout
remarks:
When you call this method, the user must click
OK
in the dialog that shows the system-generated hole callout.
